name: Alliance Investment Management
overview:
Alliance is a class one licensed broker dealer investment management and advisory firm, providing access to the global financial market via The Bahamas. Our products include US and international execution of stocks, bonds, options, futures, foreign exchange, commodities, and mutual funds, as well as discretionary asset management services.

Our investment management or trading accounts can be established quickly and easily offering flexibility of our numerous premium products, such as debit cards with instant ATM access, margin arrangements and more.

Alliance assists in coordinating the formation of foreign companies, Asset Protection Trusts Structures and can make legal and accounting referrals through its network of professional financial service providers. Operating within the jurisdiction of The Bahamas, Alliance is committed to giving clients personalized and professional service, in an environment of strict privacy and confidentiality.

offices.address1: Center of Commerce, Ground Floor One Bay Street
